member.name: T:Furion.Validation.Base64ValueValidation
member.summary: Base64 值验证器

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.Base64ValueValidation.Base64Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [Dd].
○ Match a character in the set [Aa].
○ Match a character in the set [Tt].
○ Match a character in the set [Aa].
○ Match ':'.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a character in the set [A-Za-z\u212A] atomically at least once.
○ Match '/'.
○ Match a character in the set [+-.0-9A-Za-z\u212A] greedily at least once.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match ';'.
○ Match a character in the set [-A-Za-z\u212A] atomically at least once.
○ Match '='.
○ Match a character in the set [-0-9A-Za-z\u212A] greedily at least once.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match ';'.
○ Match a character in the set [Bb].
○ Match a character in the set [Aa].
○ Match a character in the set [Ss].
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match the string "64".
○ Match ','.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [!$-;=?-Z_a-z~\u212A\s] lazily any number of times.
○ Match a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.ChineseNameValueValidation
member.summary: 中文姓名值验证器

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.ChineseNameValueValidation.ChineseNameRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [\u00B7\u4E00-\u9FA5] atomically at least 2 and at most 16 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.ChineseValueValidation
member.summary: 中文/汉字值验证器

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.ChineseValueValidation.ChineseRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Loop greedily at least once.
○ Match with 7 alternative expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [\u3400-\u4DB5\u4E00-\u9FEA\uFA0E\uFA0F\uFA11\uFA13\uFA14\uFA1F\uFA21\uFA23\uFA24\uFA27-\uFA29].
